text: Bereznik () is a rural locality (a village) in Pereborskoye Rural Settlement, Beryozovsky District, Perm Krai, Russia. The population was 6 as of 2010. == Geography == It is located 1.5 km north from Perebor. == References == Category:Rural localities in Beryozovsky District, Perm Krai
title: Bereznik, Beryozovsky District, Perm Krai
